name: Multiplatform Project inspired in Amoung Us
name_original: Multiplatform Project inspired in Amoung Us
description:
This project had the objective of being able to be presented on multiple platforms (Web, PC and Android), considering the restrictions that each one could have.

PC - Web : 

  • Movement: WASD
  • Interactions: E

Android:

  • Movement: Joystick
  • Interactions: Buttons on Screen

The sprites aren't my own, here are the links!

  • Player Sprite: https://gamekrazzy.itch.io/8-direction-top-down-character
  • Props: https://xenophero.itch.io/sci-fi-furniture-sprites
  • TilePalette: https://trevor-pupkin.itch.io/tech-dungeon-roguelite
